title: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor
description:
When performing the steps to revert a file in the java editor, it takes significantly longer than closing and reopening the file. 

To reproduce this issue: 

1. Answer 'no' to the 'Do you want to save changes' dialog when prompted. 
2. Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it. 
3. Repeat steps 1 and 2. 
4. From the pop-up menu in the editor, select 'Revert'. 

Expected Behavior: 
Reverting the file contents should not take more time than simply closing and reopening the file.

Observed Behavior: 
When selecting 'Revert' in the editor, it takes approximately 15 seconds for the contents of the window to be replaced with the original content.
